item.title: Building a Zero-Code Photography Portfolio
item.author: Tonderai Khatai
item.description:
Someone close to me is a photographer. She needed a website to show her work â€” somewhere people could browse her photos, organised into galleries, without paying a monthly subscription.

The catch? She’s not technical. At all. She doesn’t want to open a terminal, learn a code editor, or think about “deploying” anything. She just wants to put photos in a folder and have them show up on a website.
